verses.verse: (The Nations Exhorted to Praise God.) To the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. A Psalm. A Song. God be gracious and kind-hearted to us and bless us, And make His face shine [with favor] on us- Selah.
That Your way may be known on earth, Your salvation and deliverance among all nations.
Let the peoples praise You, O God; Let all the peoples praise You.
Let the nations be glad and sing for joy, For You will judge the people fairly And guide the nations on earth. Selah.
Let the peoples praise You, O God; Let all the peoples praise You.
The earth has yielded its harvest [as evidence of His approval]; God, our God, blesses us.
God blesses us, And all the ends of the earth shall fear Him [with awe-inspired reverence and submissive wonder].
